document_data.caption: A map of Leuthilspar with the Sunstone Commons marked at #28.
document_data.name: Sunstone Commons
document_data.mainbody: '''Sunstone Commons''' was a star-shaped open area in the city of [[Leuthilspar]] on the island of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Activities: It was used as a common meeting place, an area for delivering speeches or crying news, and a day and night market, particularly for trading in [[wine]] and food, with elven merchants trading for temporary stalls.
document_data.Description: A large statue of [[Corellon Larethian]] was located at the center of the plaza. At night, the area was lit by large [[sunstone (magic item)|sunstones]].
